ANGULARWIPE.DESCRIPTION: A wipe that clears angled sections of the screen progressively closer to the center.
ANGULARWIPE.NAME: Angular Wipe
ANGULARWIPE.LABEL: Wipe to {background} over {duration}ms

BARWIPE.DESCRIPTION: A wipe that consists of a series of bars from alternating sides of the screen.
BARWIPE.NAME: Bar Wipe
BARWIPE.LABEL: {bars}-bar {direction} wipe to {background} over {duration}ms

BILINEARWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Two linear wipes along a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal axis originating from either the center or outer edges of the screen.
BILINEARWIPE.NAME: Bilinear Wipe
BILINEARWIPE.LABEL: Wipe from {radial} / {direction} to {background} over {duration}ms

BOSSSPLASH.DESCRIPTION: Trigger an animation from the Boss Splash Screen module.
BOSSSPLASH.NAME: Boss Splash Screen

CHROMAKEY.DESCRIPTION: Replace one color found in the current transition image with another.  Useful for adding transparency to green screen videos.
CHROMAKEY.NAME: Chroma Key

CLEAREFFECTS.DESCRIPTION: Remove any transition effects that have been applied to the overlay.
CLEAREFFECTS.NAME: Clear Effects

CLOCKWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Wipe the screen around the center point in either a clockwise or counterclockwise direction.
CLOCKWIPE.NAME: Clock Wipe
CLOCKWIPE.LABEL: Wipe {clockDirection} from {direction} to {background} over {duration}ms

DIAMONDWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Break the screen into diamond shapes that shrink over time, starting from the left to the right.
DIAMONDWIPE.NAME: Diamond Wipe
DIAMONDWIPE.LABEL: Wipe to {background} over {duration}ms

FADE.DESCRIPTION: Fade from the current foreground to a specified background color.
FADE.NAME: Fade
FADE.LABEL: Fade to {background} over {duration}ms

FIREDISSOLVE.DESCRIPTION: Apply a burning effect to the screen, exposing the underlying background.
FIREDISSOLVE.NAME: Fire Dissolve (Burn)
FIREDISSOLVE.LABEL: Screen burn effect over {duration}ms

FLASH.DESCRIPTION: Flashes the screen a given color or texture.
FLASH.NAME: Flash
FLASH.LABEL: Flash the screen {background} for {duration}ms

HIDEOVERLAY.DESCRIPTION: Sets the transition overlay to invisible, exposing the new scene underneath.
HIDEOVERLAY.NAME: Hide Overlay

LINEARWIPE.DESCRIPTION: A linear wipe from one side of the screen to the other, exposing a given background color along the way.
LINEARWIPE.NAME: Linear Wipe
LINEARWIPE.LABEL: Linear wipe from the {direction} to {background} over {duration}ms

MACRO.DESCRIPTION: Execute a macro.  This will execute for each user with their own permissions, so please be sure they have permission at all.
MACRO.NAME: Macro
MACRO.LABEL: Execute macro: {macro}

MELT.DESCRIPTION: Melt the screen like you may have seen in a certain demon-killing FPS.
MELT.NAME: Melt
MELT.LABEL: Melt the screen to {background} over {duration}ms

PARALLEL.DESCRIPTION: Run multiple sequences of transition effects simultaneously.
PARALLEL.NAME: Parallel

PIXELATE.DESCRIPTION: Increase the displayed size of pixels in the overlay texture.
PIXELATE.NAME: Pixelate
PIXELATE.LABEL: Pixelate {target} over {duration}ms

RADIALWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Circular wipe, starting either from the inside or outside of the screen.
RADIALWIPE.NAME: Radial Wipe (Shutter)

REPEAT.DESCRIPTION: Repeat either the previous step or a specified sequence of steps.
REPEAT.NAME: Repeat

REVERSE.DESCRIPTION: Play the previous step in reverse, if available.
REVERSE.NAME: Reverse

SHOWOVERLAY.DESCRIPTION: Set the transition overlay to visible again.
SHOWOVERLAY.NAME: Show Overlay

SOUND.DESCRIPTION: Play a sound during the transition.  Unlike most transition steps, this one will NOT wait until the sound is finished to continue to the next.
SOUND.NAME: Play Sound

SPIRALSHUTTER.DESCRIPTION: A shutter-type wipe in a spiral shape.
SPIRALSHUTTER.NAME: Spiral Shutter

SPIRALWIPE.DESCRIPTION: A spiral-shaped screen wipe, starting from the outside or inside of the screen.
SPIRALWIPE.NAME: Spiral Wipe

SPOTLIGHTWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Bilinear wipe centered on a point along the edge of, and starting from either the inside or outside of the screen.
SPOTLIGHTWIPE.NAME: Spotlight Wipe

STARTPLAYLIST.DESCRIPTION: Start playing the new scene's configured ambient sound / playlist.
STARTPLAYLIST.NAME: Start Ambient Playlist

TEXTURESWAP.DESCRIPTION: Set the current transition background to a given image.
TEXTURESWAP.NAME: Texture Swap

WAIT.DESCRIPTION: Wait some specified amount of time.
WAIT.NAME: Wait

ZOOM.DESCRIPTION: Zoom in on some point on the screen.
ZOOM.NAME: Zoom

ZOOMBLUR.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously zoom in on and blur the screen.
ZOOMBLUR.NAME: Zoom & Blur
